Test Documentation
==================

Requirements
------------

.. req:: System shall be fast
   :id: REQ-001
   :status: open

   The system shall respond within 100ms.

.. req:: System shall be secure
   :id: REQ-002
   :status: implemented

   The system shall use encryption.

Specifications
--------------

.. spec:: Performance specification
   :id: SPEC-001
   :status: open
   :links: REQ-001

   Response time must be less than 100ms.
